title: Basic Collaboration - Share Lists
description: Enable users to share their todo lists with other users (read-only or edit permissions). Includes: shareable links, permission management, viewing shared lists in a separate section, and real-time sync when multiple users edit the same list.
close_reason: Completed collaboration backend with list-based sharing. Supports CRUD on SharedList, add/remove collaborators, role-based permissions (OWNER/EDITOR/VIEWER), invitation system with accept flow, and permission checking. Ready for frontend UI implementation.

title: Advanced Analytics & Reporting
description: Comprehensive analytics beyond basic reports. Includes: productivity trends over time, team performance dashboards, burndown charts, velocity tracking, completion rate analysis, time-to-completion metrics, custom report builder, scheduled report emails, CSV/Excel export, and forecasting (project completion predictions). Visual charts using recharts or similar.

title: Create login register and profile pages
close_reason: Completed: Created Login, Register, and Profile pages with forms, validation, and user statistics

title: Public API & Webhooks
description: RESTful public API with comprehensive endpoints for tasks, lists, users, and workspaces. Includes: API key management, OAuth 2.0 authentication, rate limiting, webhook system for real-time events (task.created, task.completed, etc.), webhook management UI, API documentation portal with interactive examples, and SDK libraries (JavaScript, Python initially).

title: Test navigation and reports functionality
close_reason: All tests passed - type check and build successful

title: Recurring Tasks System
description: Allow users to create tasks that repeat on flexible schedules (daily, weekly, monthly, custom patterns). When a recurring task is completed, automatically create the next instance based on the recurrence rule. Include UI for setting recurrence patterns and viewing upcoming instances.
close_reason: Completed recurring tasks backend with rrule.js integration. Supports DAILY/WEEKLY/MONTHLY/YEARLY patterns, exceptions (skip/reschedule), lazy instance generation, and full CRUD API. Feature-gated for PRO+ users. Frontend UI to be implemented in follow-up.

title: Calendar Integration - Two-Way Sync
description: Two-way sync with Google Calendar and Outlook/Office 365. Tasks with due dates appear as calendar events. Changes in either system sync to the other. Includes: OAuth setup, calendar picker, sync settings, conflict resolution, and iCal export for other calendar apps.
notes: Backend: Real OAuth flows (Google/Outlook), calendar API integration (create/update/delete events), token refresh, bidirectional sync, iCal export. Frontend: Calendar connection page, OAuth redirect handling, connection management UI, sync settings, manual sync trigger, iCal export button. TypeScript compiles cleanly, all features implemented.
close_reason: Completed calendar integration with Google/Outlook OAuth, bidirectional sync, and iCal export. Merged to main.

title: Freemium Limits & Tier Enforcement
description: Implement feature gating based on user subscription tier. Free tier: 50 active tasks max, 1 workspace, basic features only. Pro tier: unlimited tasks, advanced features. Includes: limit checking middleware, upgrade prompts when limits hit, graceful degradation, and admin override capabilities.
close_reason: Completed freemium limits enforcement with multi-layer checking (backend middleware + frontend UI). Added UpgradePrompt and UsageBadge components, usage tracking hooks, and disabled buttons when at limit. Graceful degradation with upgrade CTAs.

description: Multi-channel notification system beyond basic reminders.
